extendedInfo.description: *** Apple App Store Ranking in US, (2011.11.21) - Overall : 88  - Socail Networking Category : 8 *** "The App of the Weekâ in the Germany AppStore!*** Congratulations! VocalPost app was selected to move on to the second round of the AT&T Open Call contest (2011).  VocalPost is your microphone to the world has released new features in version 2.0! Your voice is the most powerful and effective way to communicate! Faster than typing a post, better than texting! With a touch of a button use your phone to record your voice and then post it to FacebookÂ® and/or Twitter Â®   Generate a tiny URL for tweets.  Playback, review and re-record as desired.  Include a caption message to draw attention to your recorded message.*. Version 2.0 Features - Send a voice to your Facebook Friends, and Twitter Followers or send your VocalPost to emails or SMS using your existing Contact lists. Recipients click on the URL links in the message and listen to your private voice message. - Do you have multiple accounts with Facebook/Twitter?  Register up to 2 accounts on each service.- Have something to say you want the whole world to hear? Your VocalPost recording can be posted to www.vocalpost.com where all other VocalPost users around the world can listen!  Click the â+â sign in the app to see a list of VocalPost recordings that are publicly available. - Supports voice modulation allowing you to produce funny voices!  Your friends will love it!Note: VocalPost is a twitter/facebook utility but not a direct means to monitor your news feeds, and read or respond to posts.Platforms supports;- Android OS (2.x) and (3.x)- iOS 4.x and iOS 5.x - WVGA (480x800) / HVGA (320x480) / WXGA (1280X800) / XGA (1024x768)

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: But seriously. There is no like system. There is no way to add friends, or know if some one is listening. I want people to comment. Give me a fan system!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Stable, simple, and targeted. Perfect way to post short voice clips.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Voice Post
reviews.comment: Will not let me log into fb. That is the whole purpose of the app!
reviews.author: Darci Brubaker

reviews.title: Why
reviews.comment: Why will it not let me log in to facebook please fix good app can you make it a playing window on facebook feeds instead of having to leave facebook like audioboo thanks and tinyvox record for however long you want adress these issues and its a five star app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: V good application
reviews.comment: Use this a lot wouldn\'t delete of my S2. Only reason its getting 4 and not 5 is that it force closes on Auth screen of my Samsung 8.9 honeycomb Tab.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A simple yet beautiful app! So easy. So useful. If you want to add voice to your tweets or Facebook wall then download now! I love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: voice of a chipmunk
reviews.comment: This app is promising...but..I have 2 problems + 1 suggestion: - records for only 30 seconds - when I hit playback it makes me sound like a chipmunk (is there anyway to get this to playback at normal speed?) - would be great if I can post to tumblr as well ^^ (assuming my second point can be fixed) SE Xperia X10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome App..
reviews.comment: Most of all so simple and intuitive to use..now I can send my voice to my contact (email and SMS) like voice mail!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Longer than 30m recordings would be great as well as posting to facebook pages.otherwise great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not so bad... The quality can be a little bit better, but it\'s still a good app to use! Make the quality just a little better. :)
